title: Spearman's concept of g is most accurately defined

content.question: The concept of g is most accurately defined as which of the following?

choices.label: a specific type of performance that is affected by intelligence
one of seven fundamental abilities that determine behavior
a single, underlying intellectual capacity measured by intelligence tests
the storehouse of knowledge and facts that we accumulate during our adult years

content.answer: a single, underlying intellectual capacity measured by intelligence tests

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
